infodynamics.utils

Class ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.utils.MeasurementDistribution
      • infodynamics.utils.AnalyticMeasurementDistribution
        • infodynamics.utils.ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution

  • public class ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution
extends AnalyticMeasurementDistribution
    Class to represent analytic distributions of info theoretic measurements under some null hypothesis of a relationship between the variables, where that distribution is a Chi Square distribution.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
